pages.text: Talismans are able to give the wearer various effects based on the type and level.
A basic talisman, mainly used by miners to speed up their mining capabilities. Can be upgraded a total of 2 times
A talisman used by fighters to increase their fighting capabilities. Can be upgraded a total of 2 times
A talisman that gives a big vigor boost, giving speed and regeneration to the wearer. Can be upgraded 1 time
